snippet: Justin Faulk of the Carolina Hurricanes scored four minutes into overtime, sending the United States to a 3-2 victory over Kazakhstan at hockey’s world championships in Helsinki, Finland.
abstract: United States men's hockey team defeats Kazakhstan, 3-2, world championships in Helsinki, Finland.
lead_paragraph: Justin Faulk of the Carolina Hurricanes scored four minutes into overtime, sending the United States to a 3-2 victory over Kazakhstan at hockey’s world championships in Helsinki, Finland.
